title: Nubitcoinerr
author: Nubitcoinerr
content: What is up everyone! I am a knowledgeable person on bitcoin and its basic uses. I'm a very opinionated person and that means I could indulge in deep and interesting conversations on Bitcointalk. I believe I would be the perfect person to converse about intriguing topics all while promoting your brand and signature.If you feel I would be a great forum poster for your campaign, please drop your link or contact me!There's just so much going on in the world that the discussion on here can be endless and interesting as well.Thanks for your time!

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This will not get you to anywhere if you need to join a signature campaign. Have quality posts, let your quality posts earn some merits and be noticed by a signature campaign manager. Enable notification for existing signature campaigns, enable notification for service board also. Apply if your rank in needed on any campaign available.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Hi there sir,Well, you were inactive for a long period of time. I think that you should start to built your reputation on this forum and being present here before to join in a signature campaign, I don't think that someone will accept youat the moment.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Nubitcoinerr on August 02, 2022, 05:21:17 PMWhat is up everyone! I am a knowledgeable person on bitcoin and its basic uses. I'm a very opinionated person and that means I could indulge in deep and interesting conversations on Bitcointalk. I believe I would be the perfect person to converse about intriguing topics all while promoting your brand and signature.If you feel I would be a great forum poster for your campaign, please drop your link or contact me!There's just so much going on in the world that the discussion on here can be endless and interesting as well.Thanks for your time!You have come back a long after and hopefully think it is not too bad sign. But I am not sure what is the intention of you. You have come back and changed your wallet as well as asked a non -collateral loan. Would you like to verify your identity from your previously staked wallet id: 1DJtKvKFdSaFDnaqwMEwwh4MrMkzeeUicJ

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on August 02, 2022, 05:51:15 PMQuote from: Nubitcoinerr on August 02, 2022, 05:21:17 PMWhat is up everyone! I am a knowledgeable person on bitcoin and its basic uses. I'm a very opinionated person and that means I could indulge in deep and interesting conversations on Bitcointalk. I believe I would be the perfect person to converse about intriguing topics all while promoting your brand and signature.If you feel I would be a great forum poster for your campaign, please drop your link or contact me!There's just so much going on in the world that the discussion on here can be endless and interesting as well.Thanks for your time!You have come back a long after and hopefully think it is not too bad sign. But I am not sure what is the intention of you. You have come back and changed your wallet as well as asked a non -collateral loan. Would you like to verify your identity from your previously staked wallet id: 1DJtKvKFdSaFDnaqwMEwwh4MrMkzeeUicJA good observation and suggestion as well, just what i was about to suggest to OP after going through his profile and discovering that he just woke up after a long period of sleep, the identity verification through signing a message with his previous wallet address is very important, most especially, this period a lot of users complain of their forum account being hacked and all that.@op, verifying your identity through signing a message from your previous owned address i think is a good way to start the journey towards rebuilding your reputation and also proving that you are truly the initial owner of the account you are currently accessing the forum with.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Something you don't know about sig campaign over here I don't is possible jumping out from nowhere wanting for people to hire you to post since you said you makes quality post. Before you are entitled to be accepted in sig campaign you must meet the manager's criteria or having the required merits earned for the past 128 days or lesser before you could be considered eligible. Basically I think you should read instructions before seeking for sig campaign.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I think you are going to have to apply for signature campaign yourself instead of making an announcement here. That way you stand a higher chance of getting into a campaign. Keep track of this thread Overview of Bitcointalk Signature-Ad Campaigns [Last update: 30-July-22]Also clear up the air and prove that you ae still in control of your account by signing a message from your old staked address rather than the new one. Campaign managers tend to prefer associating with members whose reputation is clean.

comments.author: malcovi2
comments.body: looking for non- collateral loan plus seeking for sig campaign, something is off. Also with your posting history you wouldn't get an offer.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: This isn't right way to apply for campaign. Everyone is applying in common way when there is open spot in campaign. You're not somehow exceptional to apply in such way like you did. And in general, you returned after long time inactivy and so far haven't made quality posts after return - something what is main factor to get accepted into campaign. You just made non collateral loan request what is bad sign already and also have negative trust ranking from past.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Nubitcoinerr on August 02, 2022, 05:21:17 PMWhat is up everyone!Starting from your first words of pleasantries, this doesn't sound polite enough to be used in a forum like this and you expect back a credible regardsQuote from: Nubitcoinerr on August 02, 2022, 05:21:17 PMI am a knowledgeable person on bitcoin and its basic uses.This should be more of your personal stuffs, i see no need broadcasting that here in telling, at keast your post and presence could go a kong way in tellingQuote from: Nubitcoinerr on August 02, 2022, 05:21:17 PMIf you feel I would be a great forum poster for your campaign, please drop your link or contact me!Should in casr iys a campaign you need to get enrolled, all you need is to read the rules and judge yourself if eligible, but if its other services related to campaign management is what you provide then i think this isn't professional enough.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: I don't see in your posts where you are a good poster and those who will hire you will be shortchanged if you posted one-liners like these, why not join a signature campaign first where the campaigns are holding the best posters on their participants if you win every week then you have something to boast and clients will bid for your service.
